page.title: 14The Boy Scouts
page.content: The scout group was formed by a man called Baden-Powell and he is famous the world over for forming the scout movement.Our leader is called "Bosun" and we meet on a Thursday at 7.30pm. We start our evening by colllecting "subs"-we pay 20p each week.Then we raise the Union Jack,or flag.We go into groups to work for different badges.Some of these are called "cyclist","first-aid" and "collectors".We also learn knotting and sometimes have a game.We go to a camp in summer and this year we are going to the Yorkshire Dales.To close our meeting we lower the flag and then say a prayer.
